detectors.description:

Reentrancy in SimpleERC20.constructor(string,string,uint256,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleERC20.sol#946-955):
	External calls:
	- ServicePayer(feeReceiver,SimpleERC20) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleERC20.sol#951)
		- ServiceReceiver(receiver).pay{value: msg.value}(serviceName) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleERC20.sol#895)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _mint(_msgSender(),initialBalance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleERC20.sol#954)
		- _balances[account] = _balances[account].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleERC20.sol#670)
	- _mint(_msgSender(),initialBalance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleERC20.sol#954)
		- _totalSupply = _totalSupply.add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleERC20.sol#669)
